channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dixville Notch, New Hampshire vote results are in – and point to a very long day
item.description: Election Day begins with midnight voting in this tiny town.

item.title: Bernard Marcus, a billionaire behind Home Depot, dies at 95
item.description: Marcus served 19 years as Home Depot’s first chief executive officer and was chairman of the board from 1978 until his retirement in 2002.

item.title: Trump stock jumps before election day as ex-president blasts Iowa pollster ‘enemy’ for predicting a Harris win
item.description: On the eve of the election, data suggests women voters even in America's heartland may be flocking to Kamala Harris in larger numbers than initially b...

item.title: U.S. stocks historically perform well on Election Day — live coverage
Need to Know: Investors fear this election outcome but shouldn’t
Meta’s military push is as much about the battle for open-source AI as it is about actual battles
item.description: Meta makes its model available to the U.S. military with a pitch that's largely about defending its "open source AI" framing.

item.title: Intel and Caterpillar set pace as Dow industrials run Tuesday gain to 360 points
This election result could pour fuel on stock-market rally
Dow industrials gathering steam after ISM services-sector report — live coverage
Gary Gensler’s time as SEC chair may be coming to an end— who will replace him and what does it mean for crypto?
item.description: The crypto industry spent millions of dollars this year to ensure that the SEC chair is replaced.
